name: Aqua Cats
description:
Help Wasd and Jikl recover the Amulet of Yendor at the bottom of the ocean.  Theoretically local multiplayer.

My first time participating in the 7 Day RogueLike event. I was interested in trying to make a game with a deferred movement and vision system(and some real-time elements!). I am glad that I finished and have something reasonably complete to show for it.  I will admit once you get past the initial vision and movement gimmicks the game play is a little shallow.

-Wasd and Jikl to move

- Space bar to wait.

- Press H for help

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2
